[I]1543-lia ’d finally walked out .

[I]1543-lia was supposed to be Stable [Sara]240-sara with Excel sheets for everything from [her]240-sara taxes to [her]240-sara groceries to [her]240-sara budget for next year ’s Christmas gifts , but tonight [I]1543-lia had officially reached [my]1543-lia limit and quit the dream job [I]1543-lia ’d given [my]1543-lia entire adult life to despite [everyone]210-everyone imploring [me]1543-lia to stay . But [the company]211-hoult communications ’s so famous , so iconic . [You]212-you ’ve put in so much time already . Why not stick around ? Should n’t [you]212-you consider [yourself]212-you lucky to be there in the first place ? ”[212-you]

[I]1543-lia scrunched up [my]1543-lia face as [I]1543-lia freed [myself]1543-lia from [my]1543-lia blazer .

Yeah , no . Not so much .

All burned .

[SARA]240-sara

[JULIAN]1-julian

[I]1543-lia took off of work for the first week that [Sara]1-julian came [home]326-home . [She]1460-her was moving in with [me]1543-lia . [We]1459-we were both well aware of that – [we]1459-we just did n’t say it quite yet .

But within the first three days , [we]1459-we fell into a perfect little domestic routine . [I]1543-lia woke up early to go for a run , come [home]326-home to [shower]1461-shower then make [us]1459-we breakfast . [My]1543-lia favorite nights were the one when [Mom]1031-mom or [Emmett]319-turner dropped by , either to drop off some home cooked food or , in [Emmett]319-turner ’s case , to eat it .
